greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Regular triangle where T(n,k) is the number of multiset partitions of strongly normal multisets of size n into k blocks, where a multiset is strongly normal if it spans an initial interval of positive integers with weakly decreasing multiplicities.
link: Andrew Howroyd, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1275 (rows 1..50)
program: D(p, n)={my(v=vector(n)); for(i=1, #p, v[p[i]]++); my(u=EulerT(v)); Vec(1/prod(k=1, n, 1 - u[k]*x^k + O(x*x^n))-1, -n)/prod(i=1, #v, i^v[i]*v[i]!)}
xref: Row sums are A035310. First and last columns are both A000041.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Aug 06 2018
ext: Terms a(46) and beyond from _Andrew Howroyd_, Dec 30 2020
